about_the_game:
Help the knight Roger in his mission to rescue survivors in an ancient dungeon, in this turn-based RPG game with horror elements based on old games and other Survivor Horror and Soulslike titles. Face challenges like dealing with monsters, puzzles and yourself.

*Controls*

*Ghost*

When you die you will turn into a ghost, so you will not be able to talk to anyone, unless you use a "Soul Stone" to come back to life. But the more times you die, the more difficult the game becomes.

*Cheats*

In the main menu you can find some codes to "make the game easier".

*A little bit of development*

Punishment started with an idea that accidentally ended up escalating into a full game. After the creator became extremely irritated playing the game, he decided to create an even more difficult game. However, a game that was just difficult wasn't fun, so that's when the mission came to make it "easier" in the right way, but still with a high challenge, making the player have to play again several times until finally learning. With great inspiration from old games. The FACT Studio team thanks you
